name: projector-warranty-crm
description: Complete Projector Warranty Management CRM System

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.build: npm run install:all && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:production: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build:production && npm run start:backend

author: ProjectorCare Team
